blogs.title: I am on a amagazine
blogs.body: Vita Books is an independent Kenyan publisher supporting people’s struggles to create societies based on the principles of equality and justice. It aims to redress working people’s lack of power over information, communication and the media which  then restricts their access to ideas and experiences to resist imperialism.  Vita Books strives to connect and unite progressive people everywhere in their battles for justice and equality for everyone.
blogs.author: esther
